## 

```{r}
library("remotes")
install_github("NathanWhitmore/condev")
library("condev")

data(package = "condev")

data(demo1)
```

ggplot2 graphing with the tidyverse

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
ggplot()+
  geom_point(data = demo1, aes(x = x, y = y))





```

```{r}
ggplot()+
  geom_text(data = demo1, aes(x = x, y = y, label = group1))
```

```{r}

ggplot()+
  geom_line(data = demo1, aes(x = x, y = y))
```

### Anzeige der Anzahl der Variablen x in jeder Kategorie

```{r}
table(demo1$group1)
```

```{r}
ggplot()+
  geom_bar(data = demo1, aes(x = group1))
```

#### Anzeige der Summe von y f√ºr jede Kategorie 

```{r}
library(dplyr)

demo_sum <- demo1 %>%
  group_by(group1) %>%
  summarise(
    anzahl = n(),
    gesamtwert_x = sum(x, na.rm = TRUE),
    gesamtwert_y = sum(y, na.rm = TRUE)
  )

```

```{r}
ggplot(demo_sum, aes(x = group1, y = gesamtwert_y)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  geom_text(aes(label = gesamtwert_y), vjust = -0.5) +
  theme_minimal()
           
```


```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_bar(data = demo1, aes(x = group1, fill = group2))
           
```
